about_the_game:
Customization

Freely customize your dream waifu's appearance, starting with her body shape, her cup size, moving down to smaller details such as hairstyle, hair color, eye color. After the big picture is done, determine extra features such as animal ears, horns, tail, halo among other things to create the perfect cutie!

Personality Archetypes

It is also possible to choose personality archetypes for your waifu: these determine her mannerisms, her way of speech and voice throughout the game, wherever she appears. Whether to make her shy, extro- or introverted, smart, clumsy, tsundere or yandere, there are many choices!

6 Outfit Slots

Mix and match her outfit from different sets to bring out the perfect look for your waifu. While not all parts of her clothing are visible at all times, many scenes will also allow you to look at her in all her stylized glory!

40+ Erotic Animations

Why not get to know your creation better? Bring her to different sceneries, and freely engage in some hot and sweaty action with full range of camera movement, to be able to view the scene from any and all angles. Select erotic poses from a great variety, whether vanilla or the more extreme.

20+ Cool and Cute Poses

It is also possible to engage the waifu in some more pinuppy style poses, allowing to bring out her chosen personality archetype all the better.

Location, daytime

When and where the erotic animations, or pinup poses play out is also entirely up to you. Whether you prefer some outdoorsy fun under the sun, a romantic indoors scene, or something even kinkier at night.

content_descriptors.notes:
The whole game revolve around sexuality e.g.
* the icons and user interface
* the story 
* the characters
* the adult cutscenes

In some scene interactions between 2 or more adults are shown.  The erotic movements and nudity of women are  frequent in the game. In the dialogues the sexuality also there in a mid level.

No violence and drug in the game.

name: My Waifu - a Pornstar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL® Pentium Dual Core G3250
  • Graphics: Any with dx11 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9c compliant

short_description: Bring the anime cutie of your dreams to life, selecting from a wide range of customization options, personality archetypes and engage in some kinky 3D action of your choice with her!
